windows.changelog:
1. Automatic notification will appear if a new release of SUI is available.
2. Time taken to run an EIS experiment is shortened.
3. Prime/Solo models can run PITT and GITT experiments.
4. Maximum Power tile is removed from Build an Experiment.
5. Other minor bugs fixed.

osx.changelog:
1. Automatic notification will appear if a new release of SUI is available.
2. Time taken to run an EIS experiment is shortened.
3. Prime/Solo models can run PITT and GITT experiments.
4. Maximum Power tile is removed from Build an Experiment.
5. Other minor bugs fixed.
